19void ConstantExpressionInterface::I32Const(FullDecoder* decoder, Value* result,
20 int32_t value) {
21 if (generate_value()) result->runtime_value = WasmValue(value);
22}
23
24void ConstantExpressionInterface::I64Const(FullDecoder* decoder, Value* result,
25 int64_t value) {
26 if (generate_value()) result->runtime_value = WasmValue(value);
27}
28
29void ConstantExpressionInterface::F32Const(FullDecoder* decoder, Value* result,
30 float value) {
31 if (generate_value()) result->runtime_value = WasmValue(value);
32}
33
34void ConstantExpressionInterface::F64Const(FullDecoder* decoder, Value* result,
35 double value) {
36 if (generate_value()) result->runtime_value = WasmValue(value);
37}
38
39void ConstantExpressionInterface::S128Const(FullDecoder* decoder,
40 const Simd128Immediate& imm,
41 Value* result) {
42 if (!generate_value()) return;
43 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(imm.value, kWasmS128);
44}
45
46void ConstantExpressionInterface::UnOp(FullDecoder* decoder, WasmOpcode opcode,
47 const Value& input, Value* result) {
48 if (!generate_value()) return;
49 switch (opcode) {
50 case kExprExternConvertAny: {
51 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(
52 WasmToJSObject(isolate_, input.runtime_value.to_ref()),
53 ValueType::RefMaybeNull(HeapType::kExtern, input.type.nullability()));
54 break;
55 }
56 case kExprAnyConvertExtern: {
57 const char* error_message = nullptr;
58 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(
59 JSToWasmObject(isolate_, input.runtime_value.to_ref(), kWasmAnyRef,
60 &error_message)
61 .ToHandleChecked(),
62 ValueType::RefMaybeNull(HeapType::kAny, input.type.nullability()));
63 break;
64 }
65 default:
66 UNREACHABLE();
67 }
68}
69
70void ConstantExpressionInterface::BinOp(FullDecoder* decoder, WasmOpcode opcode,
71 const Value& lhs, const Value& rhs,
72 Value* result) {
73 if (!generate_value()) return;
74 switch (opcode) {
75 case kExprI32Add:
76 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::AddWithWraparound(
77 lhs.runtime_value.to_i32(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i32()));
78 break;
79 case kExprI32Sub:
80 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::SubWithWraparound(
81 lhs.runtime_value.to_i32(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i32()));
82 break;
83 case kExprI32Mul:
84 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::MulWithWraparound(
85 lhs.runtime_value.to_i32(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i32()));
86 break;
87 case kExprI64Add:
88 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::AddWithWraparound(
89 lhs.runtime_value.to_i64(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i64()));
90 break;
91 case kExprI64Sub:
92 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::SubWithWraparound(
93 lhs.runtime_value.to_i64(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i64()));
94 break;
95 case kExprI64Mul:
96 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(base::MulWithWraparound(
97 lhs.runtime_value.to_i64(), rhs.runtime_value.to_i64()));
98 break;
99 default:
100 UNREACHABLE();
101 }
102}
103
104void ConstantExpressionInterface::RefNull(FullDecoder* decoder, ValueType type,
105 Value* result) {
106 if (!generate_value()) return;
107 result->runtime_value =
108 WasmValue((IsSubtypeOf(type, kWasmExternRef, decoder->module_) ||
109 IsSubtypeOf(type, kWasmExnRef, decoder->module_))
110 ? Handle<Object>::cast(isolate_->factory()->null_value())
111 : Handle<Object>::cast(isolate_->factory()->wasm_null()),
112 type);
113}
114
115void ConstantExpressionInterface::RefFunc(FullDecoder* decoder,
116 uint32_t function_index,
117 Value* result) {
118 if (isolate_ == nullptr) {
119 outer_module_->functions[function_index].declared = true;
120 return;
121 }
122 if (!generate_value()) return;
123 uint32_t sig_index = module_->functions[function_index].sig_index;
124 bool function_is_shared = module_->types[sig_index].is_shared;
125 ValueType type = ValueType::Ref(module_->functions[function_index].sig_index);
126 Handle<WasmFuncRef> func_ref = WasmTrustedInstanceData::GetOrCreateFuncRef(
127 isolate_,
128 function_is_shared ? shared_trusted_instance_data_
129 : trusted_instance_data_,
130 function_index);
131 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(func_ref, type);
132}
133
134void ConstantExpressionInterface::GlobalGet(FullDecoder* decoder, Value* result,
135 const GlobalIndexImmediate& imm) {
136 if (!generate_value()) return;
137 const WasmGlobal& global = module_->globals[imm.index];
138 DCHECK(!global.mutability);
139 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
140 global.shared ? shared_trusted_instance_data_ : trusted_instance_data_;
141 result->runtime_value =
142 global.type.is_numeric()
143 ? WasmValue(reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(
144 data->untagged_globals_buffer()->backing_store()) +
145 global.offset,
146 global.type)
147 : WasmValue(handle(data->tagged_globals_buffer()->get(global.offset),
148 isolate_),
149 global.type);
150}
151
152void ConstantExpressionInterface::StructNew(FullDecoder* decoder,
153 const StructIndexImmediate& imm,
154 const Value args[], Value* result) {
155 if (!generate_value()) return;
156 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
157 GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(imm.index);
158 Handle<Map> rtt{Map::cast(data->managed_object_maps()->get(imm.index)),
159 isolate_};
160 WasmValue* field_values =
161 decoder->zone_->AllocateArray<WasmValue>(imm.struct_type->field_count());
162 for (size_t i = 0; i < imm.struct_type->field_count(); i++) {
163 field_values[i] = args[i].runtime_value;
164 }
165 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(
166 isolate_->factory()->NewWasmStruct(imm.struct_type, field_values, rtt),
167 ValueType::Ref(HeapType(imm.index)));
168}
169
170void ConstantExpressionInterface::StringConst(FullDecoder* decoder,
171 const StringConstImmediate& imm,
172 Value* result) {
173 if (!generate_value()) return;
174 static_assert(base::IsInRange(kV8MaxWasmStringLiterals, 0, Smi::kMaxValue));
175
176 DCHECK_LT(imm.index, module_->stringref_literals.size());
177
178 const wasm::WasmStringRefLiteral& literal =
179 module_->stringref_literals[imm.index];
180 const base::Vector<const uint8_t> module_bytes =
181 trusted_instance_data_->native_module()->wire_bytes();
182 const base::Vector<const uint8_t> string_bytes = module_bytes.SubVector(
183 literal.source.offset(), literal.source.end_offset());
184 Handle<String> string =
185 isolate_->factory()
186 ->NewStringFromUtf8(string_bytes, unibrow::Utf8Variant::kWtf8)
187 .ToHandleChecked();
188 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(string, kWasmStringRef.AsNonNull());
189}
190
191namespace {
192WasmValue DefaultValueForType(ValueType type, Isolate* isolate) {
193 switch (type.kind()) {
194 case kI32:
195 case kI8:
196 case kI16:
197 return WasmValue(0);
198 case kI64:
199 return WasmValue(int64_t{0});
200 case kF32:
201 return WasmValue(0.0f);
202 case kF64:
203 return WasmValue(0.0);
204 case kS128:
205 return WasmValue(Simd128());
206 case kRefNull:
207 return WasmValue(
208 type == kWasmExternRef || type == kWasmNullExternRef ||
209 type == kWasmExnRef || type == kWasmNullExnRef
210 ? Handle<Object>::cast(isolate->factory()->null_value())
211 : Handle<Object>::cast(isolate->factory()->wasm_null()),
212 type);
213 case kVoid:
214 case kRtt:
215 case kRef:
216 case kBottom:
217 UNREACHABLE();
218 }
219}
220} // namespace
221
222void ConstantExpressionInterface::StructNewDefault(
223 FullDecoder* decoder, const StructIndexImmediate& imm, Value* result) {
224 if (!generate_value()) return;
225 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
226 GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(imm.index);
227 Handle<Map> rtt{Map::cast(data->managed_object_maps()->get(imm.index)),
228 isolate_};
229 WasmValue* field_values =
230 decoder->zone_->AllocateArray<WasmValue>(imm.struct_type->field_count());
231 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < imm.struct_type->field_count(); i++) {
232 field_values[i] = DefaultValueForType(imm.struct_type->field(i), isolate_);
233 }
234 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(
235 isolate_->factory()->NewWasmStruct(imm.struct_type, field_values, rtt),
236 ValueType::Ref(imm.index));
237}
238
239void ConstantExpressionInterface::ArrayNew(FullDecoder* decoder,
240 const ArrayIndexImmediate& imm,
241 const Value& length,
242 const Value& initial_value,
243 Value* result) {
244 if (!generate_value()) return;
245 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
246 GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(imm.index);
247 Handle<Map> rtt{Map::cast(data->managed_object_maps()->get(imm.index)),
248 isolate_};
249 if (length.runtime_value.to_u32() >
250 static_cast<uint32_t>(WasmArray::MaxLength(imm.array_type))) {
251 error_ = MessageTemplate::kWasmTrapArrayTooLarge;
252 return;
253 }
254 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(
255 isolate_->factory()->NewWasmArray(imm.array_type->element_type(),
256 length.runtime_value.to_u32(),
257 initial_value.runtime_value, rtt),
258 ValueType::Ref(imm.index));
259}
260
261void ConstantExpressionInterface::ArrayNewDefault(
262 FullDecoder* decoder, const ArrayIndexImmediate& imm, const Value& length,
263 Value* result) {
264 if (!generate_value()) return;
265 Value initial_value(decoder->pc(), imm.array_type->element_type());
266 initial_value.runtime_value =
267 DefaultValueForType(imm.array_type->element_type(), isolate_);
268 return ArrayNew(decoder, imm, length, initial_value, result);
269}
270
271void ConstantExpressionInterface::ArrayNewFixed(
272 FullDecoder* decoder, const ArrayIndexImmediate& array_imm,
273 const IndexImmediate& length_imm, const Value elements[], Value* result) {
274 if (!generate_value()) return;
275 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
276 GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(array_imm.index);
277 Handle<Map> rtt = handle(
278 Map::cast(data->managed_object_maps()->get(array_imm.index)), isolate_);
279 base::Vector<WasmValue> element_values =
280 decoder->zone_->AllocateVector<WasmValue>(length_imm.index);
281 for (size_t i = 0; i < length_imm.index; i++) {
282 element_values[i] = elements[i].runtime_value;
283 }
284 result->runtime_value =
285 WasmValue(isolate_->factory()->NewWasmArrayFromElements(
286 array_imm.array_type, element_values, rtt),
287 ValueType::Ref(HeapType(array_imm.index)));
288}
289
290// TODO(14034): These expressions are non-constant for now. There are plans to
291// make them constant in the future, so we retain the required infrastructure
292// here.
293void ConstantExpressionInterface::ArrayNewSegment(
294 FullDecoder* decoder, const ArrayIndexImmediate& array_imm,
295 const IndexImmediate& segment_imm, const Value& offset_value,
296 const Value& length_value, Value* result) {
297 if (!generate_value()) return;
298
299 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> data =
300 GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(array_imm.index);
301
302 Handle<Map> rtt = handle(
303 Map::cast(data->managed_object_maps()->get(array_imm.index)), isolate_);
304
305 uint32_t length = length_value.runtime_value.to_u32();
306 uint32_t offset = offset_value.runtime_value.to_u32();
307 if (length >
308 static_cast<uint32_t>(WasmArray::MaxLength(array_imm.array_type))) {
309 error_ = MessageTemplate::kWasmTrapArrayTooLarge;
310 return;
311 }
312 ValueType element_type = array_imm.array_type->element_type();
313 ValueType result_type = ValueType::Ref(HeapType(array_imm.index));
314 if (element_type.is_numeric()) {
315 const WasmDataSegment& data_segment =
316 module_->data_segments[segment_imm.index];
317 uint32_t length_in_bytes =
318 length * array_imm.array_type->element_type().value_kind_size();
319
320 if (!base::IsInBounds<uint32_t>(offset, length_in_bytes,
321 data_segment.source.length())) {
322 error_ = MessageTemplate::kWasmTrapDataSegmentOutOfBounds;
323 return;
324 }
325
326 Address source =
327 data->data_segment_starts()->get(segment_imm.index) + offset;
328 Handle<WasmArray> array_value =
329 isolate_->factory()->NewWasmArrayFromMemory(length, rtt, source);
330 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(array_value, result_type);
331 } else {
332 const wasm::WasmElemSegment* elem_segment =
333 &decoder->module_->elem_segments[segment_imm.index];
334 // A constant expression should not observe if a passive segment is dropped.
335 // However, it should consider active and declarative segments as empty.
336 if (!base::IsInBounds<size_t>(
337 offset, length,
338 elem_segment->status == WasmElemSegment::kStatusPassive
339 ? elem_segment->element_count
340 : 0)) {
341 error_ = MessageTemplate::kWasmTrapElementSegmentOutOfBounds;
342 return;
343 }
344
345 Handle<Object> array_object =
346 isolate_->factory()->NewWasmArrayFromElementSegment(
347 trusted_instance_data_, shared_trusted_instance_data_,
348 segment_imm.index, offset, length, rtt);
349 if (IsSmi(*array_object)) {
350 // A smi result stands for an error code.
351 error_ = static_cast<MessageTemplate>(Smi::cast(*array_object).value());
352 } else {
353 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(array_object, result_type);
354 }
355 }
356}
357
358void ConstantExpressionInterface::RefI31(FullDecoder* decoder,
359 const Value& input, Value* result) {
360 if (!generate_value()) return;
361 Address raw = input.runtime_value.to_i32();
362 // We have to craft the Smi manually because we accept out-of-bounds inputs.
363 // For 32-bit Smi builds, set the topmost bit to sign-extend the second bit.
364 // This way, interpretation in JS (if this value escapes there) will be the
365 // same as i31.get_s.
366 static_assert((SmiValuesAre31Bits() ^ SmiValuesAre32Bits()) == 1);
367 intptr_t shifted;
368 if constexpr (SmiValuesAre31Bits()) {
369 shifted = raw << (kSmiTagSize + kSmiShiftSize);
370 } else {
371 shifted =
372 static_cast<intptr_t>(raw << (kSmiTagSize + kSmiShiftSize + 1)) >> 1;
373 }
374 result->runtime_value = WasmValue(handle(Tagged<Smi>(shifted), isolate_),
375 wasm::kWasmI31Ref.AsNonNull());
376}
377
378void ConstantExpressionInterface::DoReturn(FullDecoder* decoder,
379 uint32_t /*drop_values*/) {
380 end_found_ = true;
381 // End decoding on "end". Note: We need this because we do not know the length
382 // of a constant expression while decoding it.
383 decoder->set_end(decoder->pc() + 1);
384 if (generate_value()) {
385 computed_value_ = decoder->stack_value(1)->runtime_value;
386 }
387}
388
389Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData>
390ConstantExpressionInterface::GetTrustedInstanceDataForTypeIndex(
391 uint32_t index) {
392 bool type_is_shared = module_->types[index].is_shared;
393 return type_is_shared ? shared_trusted_instance_data_
394 : trusted_instance_data_;
395}
